[conjecture_answer] Formal Problem Statement: import Mathlib

open Nat Topology Filter

noncomputable abbrev omnimath1787_answer : ℝ := sorry
theorem omnimath1787 :
    ∑' n : Set.Ici 2009, 1 / (choose n 2009) = omnimath1787_answer :=
  sorry
